components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description:
A rice plant, as grown before harvesting and processing. Depicted as a sheaf of Asian rice with green leaves and yellow seed heads drooping over to the right or left. Sometimes assumed to be wheat.

May be used to represent a variety of cereal grains (e.g., wheat, corn, oats, sorghum) as well as crops, fields and harvests, and farming more generally.

This emoji is occassionally used in the place of the word 'white' as in, a white skin tone. This form of Voldemorting is potentially due to the similarity of the words 'white' and 'wheat', and used in online discussions where it is undesirable to have the actual word written out.
components.title: Ear of Rice

description: A man engaged in agriculture, raising living organisms for food or raw materials. Generally depicted as wearing a wide-brimmed hat and holding a crop (such as carrots or corn) or a pitchfork.
title: Man Farmer

emoji_net_data.definition: The Man Farmer emoji is a sequence of the ?? Man and ?? Ear of Rice emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each charac http://emojipedia.org/male-farmer/
emoji_net_data.name: man farmer

bn:00033687n: Person who grows then harvests food
A person who operates a farm
A person who works the land or who keeps livestock, especially on a farm.
A farmer is a person engaged in agriculture, raising living organisms for food or raw materials.
Person who works the land or who keeps livestock.

bn:00066125n: A person who owns or operates a ranch.
A person who owns or operates a ranch

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

bn:00037332n: The art or science of cultivating gardens; gardening.
The process or action of cultivating the soil, particularly in a garden; the care of a garden; horticulture.
The act of cultivating or tending a garden.
The art and science of growing plants.
Horticulture is the branch of agriculture that deals with the art, science, technology, and business of plant cultivation.
Gardening is the practice of growing and cultivating plants as part of horticulture.

apple_vendor_description: Apple‚Äôs man farmer emoji is a hearty figure, often seen wearing a straw hat and simple work clothes, rendered with a warm, earthy color palette and Apple‚Äôs signature 3D shading that gives him a tangible, friendly presence. Realistic lighting accentuates the texture of his attire and the gentle smile on his face, embodying a connection to nature, agriculture, and hard work. This emoji is commonly used to represent farming, gardening, fresh produce, or a down-to-earth, grounded personality.
